campaigns.name: Old Town Bistro
campaigns.story:
Old Town Bistro has been a cozy neighborhood café for over 8 years, serving artisanal coffee and homemade sandwiches. We pride ourselves on creating a warm, welcoming space where the community can gather, work, and connect.

Rising costs and reduced foot traffic have put us in a challenging position. But we believe in the power of community support to keep our doors open. Your contribution will help us cover rent, pay our dedicated baristas, and continue serving the quality food and drinks you love.

We're more than just a café - we're a community hub. Help us continue being your home away from home.

rewardTiers.title: Coffee Voucher
rewardTiers.description: 1 free coffee of your choice + thank you card

rewardTiers.title: Weekly Coffee Pass
rewardTiers.description: Free coffee every day for a week + all previous rewards

rewardTiers.title: Coffee Masterclass
rewardTiers.description: Private barista workshop for 2 + lifetime 15% discount

updates.title: 70% Funded - Amazing Progress!
updates.content: We're blown away by the community support! Thanks to you, we're 70% funded. Every contribution brings us closer to staying open.

updates.title: Campaign Launch
updates.content: Today marks the beginning of our campaign to save Old Town Bistro. Your support means everything to us!

owners.name: Mabel Tan
owners.bio: Mabel opened Old Town Bistro with a dream of creating a community space. Her passion for coffee and hospitality shines through every cup.

comments.author: James Wong
comments.content: This café is my second home! Can't imagine the neighborhood without it. Full support!

comments.author: Rachel Ng
comments.content: Best coffee in the area. Donated and shared with everyone I know!

campaigns.name: Golden Wok
campaigns.story:
Golden Wok has been serving authentic Chinese cuisine for over 12 years. From hand-pulled noodles to traditional dim sum, we bring flavors from home to Singapore's diverse community.

Our family business has weathered many storms, but the current economic climate has been especially tough. With your help, we can continue sharing our culinary heritage and keeping our family legacy alive.

Every dish we serve comes with generations of recipes and love. Join us in preserving this tradition for future generations.

rewardTiers.title: Thank You Note
rewardTiers.description: Personalized thank you card from our family

rewardTiers.title: Dim Sum Box
rewardTiers.description: Box of 8 assorted dim sum + thank you note

rewardTiers.title: Cooking Class
rewardTiers.description: Private dumpling-making class for 4 + 20% lifetime discount

updates.title: 80% Funded - Almost There!
updates.content: We're overwhelmed by the support! Just 20% more to go. Thank you to every single supporter who believes in us.

updates.title: Our Campaign Begins
updates.content: Today we launch our campaign with hope and gratitude. Your support will keep our family tradition alive.

owners.name: Sarah Chen
owners.bio: Sarah learned cooking from her grandmother in Guangdong. She brought those recipes to Singapore and has been sharing them for over a decade.

comments.author: Tommy Lee
comments.content: Best dim sum outside of Hong Kong! Proud to support. 加油!

comments.author: Linda Koh
comments.content: My family's favorite Sunday spot. We can't lose this gem!

campaigns.name: Mama's Kitchen
campaigns.story:
Mama's Kitchen is all about comfort food that reminds you of home. For 6 years, we've been serving hearty, home-style meals made with love and the freshest ingredients.

The pandemic changed everything. We've adapted, pivoted, and fought to stay open. But we need your help to make it through this challenging period and continue serving the comfort food you love.

When you support us, you're not just saving a restaurant - you're preserving a place where memories are made and families gather.

rewardTiers.title: Thank You Card
rewardTiers.description: Heartfelt thank you card from Mama herself

rewardTiers.title: Cooking Session
rewardTiers.description: Private cooking lesson with Mama + 15% lifetime discount

updates.title: 40% Funded - Keep It Going!
updates.content: Thank you for believing in us! We're 40% there. Every contribution helps us get closer to our goal. Please share our campaign!

updates.title: Campaign Launch
updates.content: With hope in our hearts, we're launching this campaign. Your support means we can keep cooking with love for our community.

owners.name: Leo Fernandez
owners.bio: Leo, affectionately known as 'Mama', learned to cook from his mother. He opened Mama's Kitchen to share that same warmth and love through food.

comments.author: Sophie Tan
comments.content: This place feels like eating at my grandmother's house. So much love in every dish!

campaigns.name: Tiong Bahru Bakery
campaigns.story:
Tiong Bahru Bakery has been serving our community for over 15 years, bringing fresh artisan bread and pastries to families across Singapore. What started as a small family operation has grown into a beloved neighborhood staple, known for our signature sourdough and French croissants.

The pandemic hit us hard, and rising rent costs have made it increasingly difficult to keep our doors open. But our passion for baking and serving our loyal customers keeps us going. With your support, we can secure our lease for another year and continue doing what we love - bringing quality baked goods to the community.

Every donation helps us cover operational costs, pay our dedicated staff, and invest in quality ingredients. We're not just asking for support; we're inviting you to be part of our journey and share in our success.

rewardTiers.title: Thank You Card
rewardTiers.description: Personalized thank you card from the bakery team

rewardTiers.title: Bakery Box
rewardTiers.description: Box of 6 assorted pastries + Thank you card

rewardTiers.title: Bread Lover's Bundle
rewardTiers.description: 2 loaves of artisan bread + pastry box + card

rewardTiers.title: Supporter Discount Card
rewardTiers.description: 15% lifetime discount card + all previous rewards

rewardTiers.title: VIP Baker Experience
rewardTiers.description: Private baking class for 2 + lifetime 20% discount + all rewards

updates.title: 75% Funded - Thank You!
updates.content: We're overwhelmed by the support from our community! We've reached 75% of our goal in just 2 weeks. Your generosity means the world to us. Keep sharing our campaign!

updates.title: New Reward Tier Added!
updates.content: By popular demand, we've added a VIP Baker Experience reward tier! Learn our secret sourdough recipe in a private class.

updates.title: Campaign Launched!
updates.content: Our campaign is officially live! Thank you to everyone who has already shown their support. Together, we can keep our bakery thriving.

owners.name: Linda Tan
owners.bio: With 20 years of baking experience, Linda brings traditional French techniques to Singapore. She trained in Paris and returned home to share her passion.

owners.name: Marcus Wong
owners.bio: Marcus handles the business side while ensuring every customer leaves with a smile. His dedication to quality and community is unmatched.

comments.author: Sarah Lim
comments.content: Best croissants in Singapore! Happy to support. We can't lose this gem!

comments.author: David Chen
comments.content: Been coming here every Sunday for 5 years. Supporting all the way! 💪

comments.author: Emily Koh
comments.content: The sourdough is incredible. Just donated and shared with all my friends!

campaigns.name: Corner Coffee House
campaigns.story:
Corner Coffee House has been your neighborhood corner spot for 5 years. We're the place where friendships are made over lattes, where students study for exams, and where remote workers find their second office.

The rent increase has caught us off guard. We've built something special here - a genuine community space - and we don't want to lose it. Your support will help us negotiate with our landlord and keep serving the neighborhood.

Every coffee purchased, every hour spent here has made this place what it is. Help us keep the corner warm and welcoming.

rewardTiers.title: Coffee Punch Card
rewardTiers.description: 5 coffee stamps on your loyalty card

updates.title: 70% Funded!
updates.content: Amazing progress! Your support is incredible. We're getting closer to securing our lease.

owners.name: Keane Lim
owners.bio: Keane left corporate life to open Corner Coffee. His mission: create a space where everyone feels at home.

comments.author: Amy Chen
comments.content: This is my study sanctuary! Can't imagine life without it.

campaigns.name: Noodle Alley
campaigns.story:
Noodle Alley brings authentic Asian street food flavors to Singapore. For 10 years, we've been hand-pulling noodles and crafting broths that take 12 hours to perfect.

We're family-run, and every bowl carries generations of technique. Rising costs threaten to close our doors, but we believe our community will rally behind us.

Your support keeps traditional noodle-making alive and preserves authentic flavors for the next generation.

updates.title: 80% There!
updates.content: Just 20% away from our goal! Thank you for believing in authentic noodles.

owners.name: Sally Zhang
owners.bio: Third-generation noodle maker. Sally learned from her grandmother and brings century-old recipes to life daily.

comments.author: Kevin Tan
comments.content: Best noodles in Singapore! The broth is unmatched. Full support!

campaigns.name: Sunset Diner
campaigns.story:
Sunset Diner is where comfort food meets nostalgia. Our burgers, steaks, and milkshakes have been bringing smiles for 7 years. We're a retro American diner with a Singapore heart.

Post-pandemic recovery has been slow. We need your help to stay afloat and continue serving the classics you love in a fun, vibrant atmosphere.

Support us and keep the neon lights glowing for families, couples, and friends who make memories here.

rewardTiers.title: Private Booth Party
rewardTiers.description: Private booth party for 6 + 15% lifetime discount

updates.title: 40% Funded - Keep Going!
updates.content: We're making progress! Share our campaign and help us reach more supporters.

owners.name: Russell Anderson
owners.bio: Russell grew up loving American diners. He brought that passion to Singapore, creating a space that feels like stepping back in time.

comments.author: Michelle Goh
comments.content: Best burgers and the vibe is amazing! My kids love this place.

campaigns.name: Laksa Haven
campaigns.story:
Laksa Haven serves Singapore's iconic laksa with a secret family recipe passed down three generations. Our rich, spicy coconut broth has won awards and hearts for 11 years.

Rising ingredient costs and rent hikes threaten our survival. We're asking our loyal customers and laksa lovers to help preserve this culinary tradition.

Every bowl tells a story. Help us continue telling ours.

rewardTiers.title: Laksa Masterclass
rewardTiers.description: Learn the secret recipe + 18% lifetime discount

updates.title: 70% Funded!
updates.content: Your love for laksa is overwhelming! Let's get to 100% together.

owners.name: Arriane Lim
owners.bio: Arriane inherited her grandmother's laksa recipe. She's dedicated to keeping the tradition alive with every bowl.

comments.author: Daniel Koh
comments.content: This laksa reminds me of my childhood. Can't let it disappear!

campaigns.name: Tandoori Nights
campaigns.story:
Tandoori Nights brings authentic North Indian cuisine to Singapore. Our tandoor oven has been firing up naan and kebabs for 9 years, filling the air with aromatic spices.

We're a family business facing unprecedented challenges. Your support will help us keep the tandoor burning and continue serving generations of recipes.

Authentic Indian food brings people together. Help us keep that tradition alive.

rewardTiers.title: Naan & Curry
rewardTiers.description: Free naan and curry of choice

rewardTiers.title: Cooking Experience
rewardTiers.description: Private tandoori cooking class + 18% lifetime discount

updates.title: 70% Achieved!
updates.content: Thank you for your incredible support! Together we'll keep authentic Indian flavors alive.

owners.name: Jaslyn Kaur
owners.bio: Jaslyn learned cooking from her mother in Punjab. She's passionate about sharing authentic North Indian cuisine.

comments.author: Raj Patel
comments.content: Best butter chicken outside of India! This place is a gem.

campaigns.name: Makan Place
campaigns.story:
Makan Place is your neighborhood hawker stall serving authentic local favorites. From char kway teow to chicken rice, we've been feeding hungry Singaporeans for 13 years.

Hawker culture is fading, and we're fighting to keep it alive. Your support will help us upgrade equipment, cover rising costs, and continue serving affordable, delicious meals.

We're more than food - we're part of Singapore's heritage.

updates.title: 60% Funded!
updates.content: Thank you for supporting local hawker culture! Let's reach our goal together.

owners.name: Stefanie Ng
owners.bio: Stefanie took over the stall from her parents. She's committed to preserving hawker traditions and affordable food.

comments.author: Ben Lim
comments.content: Best char kway teow! This is what Singapore is about.

campaigns.name: Spice Hub
campaigns.story:
Spice Hub specializes in South Indian vegetarian cuisine. Our dosas, idlis, and masala are made fresh daily using traditional methods passed down generations.

We're struggling with increased costs while keeping prices affordable. Your support will help us continue serving authentic, healthy South Indian food.

Preserve vegetarian culinary traditions and support community dining.

updates.title: Campaign Launch!
updates.content: Help us preserve authentic South Indian vegetarian cuisine. Every contribution counts!

owners.name: Michael Rajan
owners.bio: Michael brings authentic South Indian recipes from Tamil Nadu, keeping vegetarian traditions alive.

comments.author: Priya Sharma
comments.content: Best dosas in Singapore! Tastes like home.

campaigns.name: Bella Trattoria
campaigns.story:
Bella Trattoria brings authentic Italian flavors to Singapore. Our pasta is handmade daily, our sauces simmer for hours, and our pizza dough ferments for 48 hours.

We're a family-run Italian restaurant facing rising import costs. Your support keeps authentic Italian cuisine accessible and our family dream alive.

Help us continue bringing la dolce vita to Singapore.

rewardTiers.title: Pasta Making Class
rewardTiers.description: Private pasta class for 2 + 20% lifetime discount

updates.title: 70% Funded - Grazie!
updates.content: Thank you for supporting authentic Italian cuisine! Mille grazie to all our supporters.

owners.name: Chris Romano
owners.bio: Chris grew up in Tuscany and brings generations of Italian cooking traditions to every dish.

comments.author: Maria Gonzalez
comments.content: The carbonara is perfection! Most authentic Italian in Singapore.

campaigns.name: Sushi Corner
campaigns.story:
Sushi Corner serves traditional Edomae-style sushi. Our chef trained in Tokyo for 8 years before bringing authentic techniques to Singapore 12 years ago.

Rising seafood costs and rent threaten our commitment to quality. Your support ensures we continue sourcing the finest fish and maintaining traditional standards.

Preserve authentic sushi craftsmanship and support sustainable sourcing.

updates.title: 80% Funded!
updates.content: Arigato gozaimasu! Just 20% more to preserve authentic sushi traditions.

owners.name: Conrad Yamamoto
owners.bio: Conrad trained under master sushi chefs in Tokyo. He's dedicated to preserving traditional Edomae techniques.

comments.author: Yuki Tanaka
comments.content: This is authentic Japanese sushi. Reminds me of Tokyo!

campaigns.name: Thai Basil
campaigns.story:
Thai Basil brings authentic Bangkok street food and royal Thai cuisine to Singapore. Our green curry and pad thai have won multiple awards over our 14-year journey.

We're almost there! Just a final push to secure our future. Your support celebrates authentic Thai flavors and family traditions.

Help us cross the finish line and continue serving award-winning Thai cuisine.

rewardTiers.title: Thai Iced Tea
rewardTiers.description: Free Thai iced tea + spring rolls

rewardTiers.title: Thai Cooking Class
rewardTiers.description: Authentic Thai cooking class + 18% lifetime discount

updates.title: 90% Funded - Almost There!
updates.content: Khob khun krab! We're 90% funded! One final push to secure our future.

owners.name: Jeremiah Suthep
owners.bio: Jeremiah learned cooking from his grandmother in Bangkok. He brings royal Thai recipes and street food favorites.

comments.author: Nina Pong
comments.content: Best green curry I've ever had! Tastes exactly like Bangkok.

campaigns.name: Burger Junction
campaigns.story:
Burger Junction makes gourmet burgers with locally-sourced ingredients. We've been flipping patties and serving smiles for 4 years, building a loyal following.

We're the new kids on the block facing tough competition. Your support will help us grow, invest in equipment, and continue crafting quality burgers.

Support local burger innovation and help us compete with big chains.

updates.title: 30% and Climbing!
updates.content: Thank you early supporters! Help us spread the word and reach our goal.

owners.name: Faith Martinez
owners.bio: Faith's passion for gourmet burgers led her to open Burger Junction. Every burger is made with love and quality.

comments.author: Alex Tan
comments.content: These burgers are next level! Way better than fast food chains.

campaigns.name: Dim Sum House
campaigns.story:
Dim Sum House specializes in traditional Cantonese dim sum. Every dumpling is hand-folded, every bun steamed to perfection. We've been serving yum cha traditions for 16 years.

Rising costs for quality ingredients threaten our standards. Your support helps us maintain quality while keeping prices fair.

Preserve authentic dim sum craftsmanship and Sunday yum cha traditions.

updates.title: 70% Funded!
updates.content: Thank you for supporting traditional dim sum! Let's preserve Sunday yum cha culture together.

owners.name: Alicia Wong
owners.bio: Alicia trained in Hong Kong's finest dim sum kitchens. She brings authentic techniques and flavors to Singapore.

comments.author: William Lee
comments.content: Sunday dim sum here is a family tradition. Best har gow in Singapore!
